configurationOverrides.description: The configuration settings that are used to override defaults configuration.

executionRoleArn.description: The execution role ARN of the job run.

jobDriver.description: Specify the driver that the job runs on. Exactly one of the two available job drivers is required, either sparkSqlJobDriver or sparkSubmitJobDriver.

jobTags.description: The tags assigned to jobs started using the job template.

releaseLabel.description: The release version of Amazon EMR.
